poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: One of the vets, by which I mean The veteran veterinarians Of the first vegetarian war, Trekking the frosty veldts Whurr Boreas vents his chanter, Returns, as he stamps out leagues and versts To vex the question of causality And concludes that starting writing verse When he vetoed the string vests Was not a simple post ergo propter hoc.
